title: Veea prices 6M shares at $1.00 in public offering
snippet: Veea (VEEA) announced the pricing of its "reasonable best efforts" public offering for the purchase and sale of 6,000,000 shares of common stock

title: Veea Inc. Announces Pricing of Approximately $9.2 Million Public Offering
snippet: The closing of the Offering is expected to occur on or about August 14, 2025, subject to the satisfaction of customary closing conditions. The Company intends to use the net proceeds from this Offering for investments in inventory and the Company's customer support infrastructure and for working capital and general corporate purposes.

title: Why Veea Stock Is Soaring - Veea (NASDAQ:VEEA) - Benzinga
snippet: According to data from Benzinga Pro, Veea shares are trading above the stock's 50-day moving average of $5.25 and approaching its 52-week high of $10.83.

title: Veea Inc.: An Edge Computing Stock Worth Watching
snippet: VEEA is at a $3.30 stock price and a $188.84 million market cap, currently trading over 2000x P/S, VEEA's sales valuation ratios currently appear as outliers as sales haven't materialized yet ...
